author: Didi
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Restrict cog! Use `[p]restrictset role` and `[p]restrictset perms` to configure it.
name: Restrict
short: Restrict/unrestrict users by assigning a role.
description: This cog allows admins to restrict users by assigning a predefined role. Includes commands to configure the restricted role and the role required to use the restrict command.
